ReflectionsDelay: Reflections Delay - 0.0 < 0.007 < 0.3 Seconds - the time between the listener receiving the direct path sound and the first reflection
GainHF: Reverb Gain High Frequency - 0.0 < 0.89 < 1.0 - attenuates the high frequency reflected sound
ReflectionsGain: Reflections Gain - 0.0 < 0.05 < 3.16 - controls the amount of initial reflections
LateDelay: Late Reverb Delay - 0.0 < 0.011 < 0.1 Seconds - time difference between late reverb and first reflections
DecayTime: Decay Time - 0.1 < 1.49 < 20.0 Seconds - larger is more reverb
Density: Density - 0.0 < 1.0 < 1.0 - Coloration of the late reverb - lower value is more grainy
Diffusion: Diffusion - 0.0 < 1.0 < 1.0 - Echo density in the reverberation decay - lower is more grainy
AirAbsorptionGainHF: Air Absorption - 0.0 < 0.994 < 1.0 - lower value means more absorption
DecayHFRatio: Decay High Frequency Ratio - 0.1 < 0.83 < 2.0 - how much quicker or slower the high frequencies decay relative to the lower frequencies.
LateGain: Late Reverb Gain - 0.0 < 1.26 < 10.0 - gain of the late reverb
Gain: Reverb Gain - 0.0 < 0.32 < 1.0 - overall reverb gain - master volume control
